QuestData.Title: Finding Yi-Mo
QuestData.Description: My nephew, Yi-Mo, has always been sort of a downer. When this wave of despair hit the town, he took it harder than most. He sat around for days refusing to eat, just staring off into the horizon.$B$BNow he's wandered off toward the cliffs northeast of here, where the thunderbirds nest and hunt.$B$BPlease, $c, will you look for him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Look for Yi-Mo Longbrow somewhere northeast of Zhu's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: Let me guess: my aunt sent you?
